biotools.summary: Viral Genome Organizer is a genome browser that can be used to display information about a genome, its genes, ORFs and start/stop codons. It can also be used to perform a regular expression search, a fuzzy motif search and a masslist search, as well as compare genomes with VOCs genome sequence database.

bioschemas.name: VGO
